faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: The most common queries from our customers answered

one.question: How long will the app development take?
one.answer: Depending on the complexity and features of the application, the timeline can vary. We can provide a more precise schedule after our initial assessment.

two.question: Which technology do you use for my mobile app?
two.answer: We use various technologies depending on our customers' needs, but our applications developed with React Native offer efficient performance on both Android and iOS platforms.

three.question: How do you handle SEO when redesigning my website?
three.answer: When redesigning your website, we adhere to SEO best practices to ensure that your site remains easily discoverable by search engines.

four.question: What are your technical support packages?
four.answer: We have monthly and yearly maintenance packages available. We offer customized technical support and maintenance services based on your needs.
